Niam Lub Kua Muag Part 2

WATCH MOVIE

Production Year:

2005

Producer(s):

Keystar Production

Writer(s):

Publisher:

Keystar Production

Release Type:

VHS

Zaj dab neeg niam lub kua muag yog hais txog niam tau nyab los nyab tsis hlub niam vim yog tub ua tsis taus txiv. Yuav noj nceb yuav tsum taug cav yuav xav tau zoo neej yuav tsum xaiv neej xaiv tsav. Yog niam tau zoo nyab niam nyob tshav ntuj nrig. Yog niam tau phem nyab niam lub kua muag si.

Cast
